body:
Declare @UretimID int
Declare c Cursor Local For
    Select Su.UretimID
    From    ITTEXTILE_StokAmbar SA
                Inner Join ITTEXTILE_GerCikanMalzeme GCM On GCM.AmbarID = SA.AmbarID
                                                            And GCM.UrunID = SA.UrunID
                                                            And GCM.FirmaID = SA.FirmaID
                                                            And GCM.IsEmriNo = SA.IsEmriNo
                                                            And ISNULL(GCM.SeriID, -1) = ISNULL(SA.SeriID, -1)
                                                            And  ISNULL(GCM.KaliteID, -1) = ISNULL(SA.KaliteID, -1)
                INNER JOIN IT07_SAP_Uretim SU On SU.CikanID = GCM.CikanID
    Where SA.IsSAPLock = 1 And SU.SAPUretimAktarimDurumID = 40
Order By SA.Adddate        
Open c
Fetch Next From c Into @UretimID
While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 Begin

    Exec PSP07_SAP_StokAmbarKilitAc_Uretim @UretimID = @UretimID

 

    Fetch Next From c Into @UretimID
End
Close c
Deallocate c
